backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling feature requests, user profiles, announcements, assignments, and study tasks with access control and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to their related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing concise summaries of all major frontend files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens for the entire frontend.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React entry component configuring routes with TanStack Router, theme provider, and global toaster.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentChatbo: Large interactive assignment chatbot supporting multilingual input, voice/image processing, suggestions, and downloadable outputs.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the main app layout with header navigation, responsive mobile menu, footer, and an outlet for routed content.
frontend/src/components/StudentSathiAssi: Implements an AI assistant UI with messaging, voice input, OCR via Tesseract, auto‑scrolling, and assignment-generation workflow.
frontend/src/components/studyPlanner/Dai: Renders a daily donut chart summarizing task completion stats and total study time.
frontend/src/components/studyPlanner/Pro: Switches between daily and weekly progress charts based on the selected view type.
frontend/src/components/studyPlanner/Sub: Displays a subject label styled with a color class determined by subject metadata.
Provides a searchable dropdown for selecting subjects, showing counts and supporting 'All Subjects' selection.
frontend/src/components/studyPlanner/Wee: Generates a weekly bar chart aggregating study hours per day from tasks and displaying totals.
frontend/src/components/UserGuidelineDoc: Empty placeholder component with no implemented content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes login and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for feature requests, assignment generation, conversation saving, and study planner task operations. Includes helpers for parsing assignment topics and confirming generation.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyPlannerSort.t: Manages and persists the study planner's sort mode using localStorage. Returns current sort mode and an updater function.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyPlannerSubjec: Stores and restores subject filters for daily and weekly study planner views separately. Syncs changes to localStorage and returns the active filter with a setter.
frontend/src/hooks/useStudyPlannerView.t: Handles persistence of the study planner's active view (daily or weekly). Loads from and saves to localStorage with a default of weekly.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for UI styling. Applies global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Renders the main App component.
Implements a multilingual assignment formatting tool with UI controls for metadata, formatting options, editing, and downloads. Includes translation sets and interactive editor features.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content and a grid of tool cards linking to various app features. Uses navigation and UI components for layout and interaction.
React page that collects student details, generates a formatted leave application letter, and allows copying it.
frontend/src/pages/NotesCleanerPage.tsx: Cleans rough notes by formatting, capitalizing, and punctuating lines, then displays and allows copying the result.
frontend/src/pages/RequestFeaturePage.ts: Form page for submitting feature requests with optional email, using a mutation hook to send data.
frontend/src/pages/ResumeBuilderPage.tsx: Simple resume builder that gathers personal info and projects, generates text output, and supports copying.
frontend/src/pages/StudyPlannerPage.tsx: Complex study planner managing tasks, filters, sorting, guest mode, and backend sync with various utilities.
Utility functions to parse duration strings into minutes and format minutes back into readable duration text.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerGuestStor: Manages guest-mode study tasks in localStorage, including loading, saving, creating, updating, and clearing tasks.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerPdfExport: Generates printable HTML for tasks and opens it in a new window for PDF-style export.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerSort.ts: Provides deterministic sorting for tasks by date/time or by ID-based creation order.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerTaskDateT: Handles conversion and formatting of optional date/time fields for study tasks.
frontend/src/utils/studyPlannerTxtExport: Builds a plain-text summary of tasks and triggers a downloadable TXT export.
frontend/src/utils/subjectColorMapping.t: Defines subject-to-color mappings and returns the appropriate CSS classes for badges and indicators.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color palette, container settings, animations, and typography/container-query/animation plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state and requirements for adding a Progress Charts section with daily and weekly charts using existing local task data.
unknown.txt: Outlines a fixed assignment-page template with editor features, download options, subject insertion, citations, checklist, and an embedded Student Sathi Assistant UI.
